required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Roxadustat Combined With Sacubitril Valsartan Sodium Tablets in the Treatment of Cardiorenal Anemia Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Parallel Controlled Trial of Roxadustat Combined withSacubitril Valsartan Sodium Tablets in the Treatment of Cardiorenal Anemia Syndrome

lead_sponsor.agency: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

clinical_study.source: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized and parallel controlled trial design of comparing the new treatment group of Roxadustat combined with Sacubitril Valsartan Sodium Tablets with the traditional treatment group of recombinant human erythropoietin (EPO) combined with ACEI or ARB in Chinese patients with cardiorenal anemia syndrome.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of hemoglobin level before and after treatment
primary_outcome.description: By detecting blood routine,calculate the changes of hemoglobin.Change value of hemoglobin level(g/L) = baseline hemoglobin level(g/L) - hemoglobin level after treatment(g/L)

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of ejection fraction before and after treatment
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac ejection fraction was measured by cardiac ultrasound before and after treatment，and change of cardiac ejection fraction(%) = baseline cardiac ejection fraction level(%) - post-treatment cardiac ejection fraction level(%)

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of acute heart failure, acute myocardial infarction, severe hyperkalemia and severe anemia during treatment
primary_outcome.description: Incidence rate = number of patients with the events/ total number of patients included in the study in this group.

arm_group.arm_group_label: New treatment group(Roxadustat combined with Sacubitril Valsartan Sodium Tablets)
arm_group.description: Roxadustat(FibroGen, China), 100mg (45-60kg) or 120mg (≥ 60kg) each time, three times a week, orally on an empty stomach in the morning. The initial dose of Sacubitril Valsartan Sodium Tablets(Novartis, China) is 50mg, once a day, taken on an empty stomach in the morning, and gradually titrated from the minimum dose to the maximum tolerated dose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Traditional treatment group(EPO combined with ACEI or ARB )
arm_group.description: Recombinant human erythropoietin (SEBOR, 10000 units / Branch) was injected subcutaneously once a week; Perindopril tablets (Servier, China), taken on an empty stomach, gradually titrated from the minimum dose to the maximum tolerated dose.

intervention.description: Select the appropriate dose according to the patient's situation
intervention.arm_group_label: New treatment group(Roxadustat combined with Sacubitril Valsartan Sodium Tablets)

intervention.description: Select the appropriate ACEI /ARB according to the subject's situation or follow its previous medication
intervention.arm_group_label: Traditional treatment group(EPO combined with ACEI or ARB )

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- diagnosed as regular dialysis patients with cardiorenal anemia syndrome
- Hemoglobin 60-110g / L (twice with an interval of at least 4 days);
- Volunteered to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- Anemia caused by diseases other than CKD
- Malignant tumors
- Active liver disease
- Rheumatic immune diseases in active stage
- Hereditary or idiopathic angioedema
- Systolic blood pressure≥180 mmHg;diastolic blood pressure≥110 mmHg
- Acute myocardial infarction and unstable angina pectoris
- Severe parathyroidism
- Active peptic ulcer
- taking aliskiren
- Mental disease
- Alcohol and drug abuse
- Allergy to test drugs

facility.name: Department of Nephrology, Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

intervention_browse.mesh_term: Sacubitril and valsartan sodium hydrate drug combination
